custom_domain.title: Custom domain
custom_domain.description: If you have a custom subdomain you can fill it in here, leave blank otherwise.

record_dnt.title: Record DNT users
record_dnt.description: Record page views also when DNT is enabled. DNT is to prevent tracking so we don't send events for those visits, but you can enable recording page views.

track_events.title: Track events
track_events.description: Select this if you want to track events with Simple Analytics. Otherwise we don't include the extra code.

hash_mode.title: Website uses hash navigation
hash_mode.description: Check this box when you website uses hashtags (#) for navigation (for example carrd.co websites). If you don't know what this means, leave the box unchecked.
